name: Reactor Meltdown (AdamJN)
description:
Ludum Dare 50 started on April 2nd 2022 and lasted 72 Hours! This was my Entry, Its a Simpsons (Not affiliated) game where you have to Delay the reactor from exploding. The Theme for Ludum Dare 50 was Delay the Inevitable!
